messages.subject: Re: Transcripts and Foreign Language
messages.msgSnippet: Was also wondering how one would do high school transcripts for college admission as an unschooler?  I am not there yet, but a friend of mine is.  She is
messages.messageBody:
"Was also wondering how one would do high school
transcripts for
college admission as an unschooler? "

I am not there yet, but a friend of mine is. She is putting together a portfolio and narrative of what her ds did. He was involved in a Philosophy group that I facilitated and I wrote a teacher evaluation letter that I had to mail directly to the college he was applying to. It all works out and the colleges accept other shows of knowledge not just transcripts.

My ds who is 16 has now been taking Japanese for the past year at our Japan/America Society. His whole reason for wanting to learn Japanese is so that he can get all the good video games years earlier than we get them here.

Laura M.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
